projects.name: Yournote
projects.details: Built a scalable React Native app with FastAPI backend, JWT authentication, Redis-based state management, and encrypted storage. Optimized MongoDB schemas to handle 10,000+ notes with offline sync and reduced API fetches by ~35%.

projects.name: Payroll Management System
projects.details: Developed a full-stack payroll system managing 50+ employee records with automated salary calculations. Implemented JWT-secured REST APIs and real-time dashboards using Chart.js and Tailwind CSS, improving administrative efficiency by 40%.

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.details: Designed a low-latency URL shortener backend with Redis caching, read-heavy optimization, asynchronous analytics processing, and rate limiting. Focused on scalability, fault isolation, and consistent redirect performance under high concurrency.

projects.name: Autonomous LLM Agent
projects.details: Built an autonomous LLM agent that parses API documentation, extracts user intent, and generates live API calls in real time. Implemented reasoning loops using LangChain, achieving 3× faster responses and 80–90% accuracy in data retrieval.
